articles.title: Man Utd: Ornstein reveals Ratcliffe's new 'priority' with Omar Berrada arrival date confirmed - Football365
articles.description: Manchester United will be 'prioritising' appointing a sporting director when incoming chief executive Omar Berrada officially joins the club.
articles.content:
Manchester United will be ‘prioritising’ appointing a sporting director when incoming chief executive Omar Berrada officially joins the club, as per David Ornstein.
